title: Vulnerable 2018 Republicans quietly shift on guns
text:
Vulnerable 2018 Republicans quietly shift on guns 11:32am GMT - 02:03 
Republicans in Congress who are locked in 2018 races viewed as toss-ups are increasingly embracing new gun control measures in the wake of the Feb. 14 shooting in Parkland, Florida, a Reuters analysis finds..
